Text: Introducing FigureMBAwould like to invite you to join a new career placement resource targete d exclusively to current students and recent graduates of the Top MBA programs worldwide FigureMBAcom FigureMBAcom is a new offering from FigureJobscom a Best of the We b Career site from Forbes Fortune and US News World Report FigureMBA allows you to post a current MBA resume and profile search among opportunities from leading employers research particular companies and industries and gather career tips and insights from a wideranging panel of industry experts The site can be a powerful new tool for you as you contin ue to refine and review your ongoing career development needs and expectations FigureMBA was developed as an exclusive network for toptier MBAs and the employers who seek them and it is a FREE service for all qualified MBA candidates If you are interested in learning more please visit the site at wwwFigureMBAcom Thank you FigureMBAcom
